Class OnSwipeTouchListener

  • java.lang.Object

    public class OnSwipeTouchListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnTouchListener
    Detecta los movimientos del dedo por la pantalla.

    • Method Detail

      • onTouch

        public boolean onTouch(android.view.View view,
                       android.view.MotionEvent motionEvent)
        Description copied from interface: android.view.View.OnTouchListener
        Called when a touch event is dispatched to a view. This allows listeners to get a chance to respond before the target view.
        Specified by:
        onTouch in interface android.view.View.OnTouchListener
        Parameters:
        view - The view the touch event has been dispatched to.
        motionEvent - The MotionEvent object containing full information about the event.
        Returns:
        True if the listener has consumed the event, false otherwise.

      • onSwipeBottom

        public void onSwipeBottom()
        Detecta cuando el usuario deslizo el dedo hacia abajo por la pantalla.
